pages.text: This $(l:bewitchment:curses/conducting_curses)Curse$() weakens the flesh, making the target more susceptible to all of the dark: poisons become more potent, $(l:bewitchment:creatures/demon)Demons$() of all kinds hit harder, water greatly slows them, and rumor has it that this $(l:bewitchment:curses/conducting_curses)Curse$() is even tied to much worse fates such as $(l:bewitchment:curses/vampirism)Vampirism$() and $(l:bewitchment:curses/lycanthropy)Lycanthropy$().
This is a $(l:bewitchment:curses/conducting_curses)Greater Curse$(); it is slightly harder to get rid of.
